element_text:
{"chunk": "risk of not detecting a material misstatement resulting
from fraud is higher than for one resulting from error as
fraud may involve collusion, forgery, intentional
omissions, misrepresentations, or the override of internal
control.
* Obtain an understanding of internal control relevant to
the audit in order to design audit procedures that are
appropriate in the circum-stances, but not for the
purpose of expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of
the Company's internal control.
* Evaluate the appropriateness of accounting policies", "context": "This chunk is part of the "Independent Auditor's Audit Report" section, which describes the auditor's responsibilities in conducting the audit of the company's financial statements."}
